clinical_history: Urinary difficulty and suspected prostate enlargement.
technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Major vessels show isoechoic waveform on Doppler.
Uterus appears hypoechoic; endometrial thickness measures 28.35 mm.
Left kidney shows unremarkable, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Urinary bladder is hyperechoic, no intraluminal lesions.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
recommendations: Refer to specialist for further evaluation.
